ing: 2 tablespoons nonfat plain yogurt (such as Mountain HighÂ®)
1/2 clove garlic, crushed, or to taste
1 teaspoon crushed dried mint, or to taste
des: "A light snack that will help you cool off."
ins: Mix cucumbers and yogurt together in a bowl. Mix in garlic until fully incorporated. Add mint and salt; mix well.
